survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from EV owners regarding their satisfaction with public charging stations, including ease of use, reliability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify data collection. Ensure options cover all potential usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select multiple factors. Limit selections to 3 for clearer data.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with a maximum of 3 selections.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
